name: My framework
tagline: This is a open source framework in php.
body:
# My Framework
My framework is a framework developed in PHP. It is very similar to CodeIgniter in folder structure and use but different in term of coding. This framework uses MVC model. As usual it contain three main folder in framework Model, View and Controller. The use of this framework is similar to codeIgniter.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
